methods.name: glm::clamp
methods.short:
Simulate GL_CLAMP OpenGL wrap mode

See also: gtx_wrap extension.

methods.name: glm::mirrorClamp

See also: gtx_wrap extension.

methods.name: glm::repeat
methods.short:
Simulate GL_REPEAT OpenGL wrap mode

See also: gtx_wrap extension.
